code: @Test public void testSMTPCanNotBeUsedForConsumingMails() throws Exception {     Endpoint endpoint = context.getEndpoint("smtp://localhost?username=james").     PollingConsumer consumer = endpoint.createPollingConsumer().     try {         consumer.start().         fail("Should have thrown NoSuchProviderException as smtp protocol cannot be used for consuming mails").     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {     // expected     } }

@Test public void testSMTPSCanNotBeUsedForConsumingMails() throws Exception {     Endpoint endpoint = context.getEndpoint("smtps://localhost?username=james").     PollingConsumer consumer = endpoint.createPollingConsumer().     try {         consumer.start().         fail("Should have thrown NoSuchProviderException as smtp protocol cannot be used for consuming mails").     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {     // expected     } }
